original_query: SELECT MIN(c.Id) FROM comments as c, postHistory as ph, votes as v, posts as p WHERE ph.PostId = p.Id AND c.PostId = p.Id AND v.PostId = p.Id AND c.Score=0 AND c.CreationDate>=CAST('2010-08-26 06:55:11' AS TIMESTAMP) AND ph.CreationDate<=CAST('2014-09-05 06:39:25' AS TIMESTAMP) AND v.VoteTypeId=2
rewritten_query: CREATE VIEW E1 AS SELECT * FROM comments AS comments WHERE comments.Score = 0 AND comments.CreationDate >= TIMESTAMP '2010-08-26 06:55:11'
CREATE VIEW E2 AS SELECT * FROM postHistory AS postHistory WHERE postHistory.CreationDate <= TIMESTAMP '2014-09-05 06:39:25'
CREATE VIEW E3 AS SELECT * FROM votes AS votes WHERE votes.VoteTypeId = 2
CREATE UNLOGGED TABLE E2E3 AS SELECT * FROM E2 WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM E3 WHERE E2.PostId=E3.PostId)
CREATE VIEW E4 AS SELECT * FROM posts AS posts
CREATE UNLOGGED TABLE E2E3E4 AS SELECT * FROM E2E3 WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM E4 WHERE E2E3.PostId=E4.Id)
CREATE UNLOGGED TABLE E1E2E3E4 AS SELECT MIN(Id) AS EXPR$0 FROM E1 WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM E2E3E4 WHERE E1.PostId=E2E3E4.PostId)
